title: E205 A Zero Gravity Wine Bra and a Coffee Date with Slender Man
description:
Be careful with your bread this year, everyone! It's episode 205 and we're already worried about what we could manifest even with just sandwich predictions. Speaking of predictions, this week Em covers all the times the TV show The Simpsons predicted the future, and how the writers just might be time-traveling mathematicians. Then Christine covers the story of Mexican human rights activist Miriam Rodríguez Martínez and how she tracked down her daughter’s killers all on her own. Also, why did no one call us to go eat cheese on Mars... and that's why we drink!

You can find Christine's heartfelt video on miscarriage here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XOiCz2KMuRs

Please consider supporting the companies that support us!

With Daily Harvest, we’re enjoying undeniably delicious, clean food, without any of the prep. And whether you’re looking to have your daily dose of fruits and veggies, or just want to have a little more time back on your hands you can too! Get started today. Go to DAILYHARVEST.com and enter promo code DRINK to get $25 off your first box!

Native deodorant is made with ingredients you’ve heard of, like coconut oil and shea butter. You wear deodorant every day, shouldn’t you be able to understand the ingredients list? Make the switch to Native TODAY by going to NativeDeo.com/drink, or use promo code drink at checkout, and get 20% off your first order.

Take control of acne, dark spots, breakouts or whatever your unique concerns may be with a powerful skincare treatment made for YOU today! Go to Curology.com/drink for a free 30-day trial. Just pay for shipping and handling! See Curology.com for all the details.

Visit https://betterhelp.com/drink and join the over 1,000,000 people taking charge of their mental health with the help of an experienced professional. Special offer for ATWWD listeners get 10% off your first month at https://betterhelp.com/drink.
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
